Verses: 1 gnaanamullavanukku Oppaanavan Yaar? Kaariyaththin Thaarpariyaththai Arindhavan Yaar? Manushanudaiya Gnaanam Avan Mugaththaip Pragaasikkappannum, Avan Mugaththin Moorkkam Maarum.
2 raajaavin Kattalaiyaik Kaikkondu Nada Endru Naan Unakku Echcharikkiren, Nee Dhevanukku Itta Aanaiyinpadiye Idhai Sey.
3 nee Avan Samugaththai Vittuvilagath Thuridhappadaadhe, Pollaadhakaariyaththile Pidivaadhamaai Nillaadhe; Avan Thanakku Ishtamaanadhellaam Seyvaan.
4 raajaavin Vaarththai Engeyo Ange Adhigaaram Undu; Neer Enna Seygireer Endru Avanukku Sollaththakkavan Yaar?
5 karpanaiyaik Kaikkollugiravan Oru Theengaiyum Ariyaan; Gnaaniyin Irudhayam Kaalaththaiyum Nyaayaththaiyum Ariyum.
6 ellaakkaariyaththukkum Kaalamum Nyaayamum Undu; Aadhalaal Manushanukku Neridum Sanjalam Migudhi.
7 innadhu Sambavikkum Endru Avan Ariyaane; Adhu Innavidhamaai Sambavikkum Endru Avanukku Sollaththakkavan Yaar?

8 aaviyai Vidaadhirukkiradharku Aaviyinmel Oru Manushanukkum Adhigaaramillai; Marananaalinmelum Avanukku Adhigaaramillai; Andhap Porukku Neengippovadhumillai; Dhunmaarkkarai Dhunmaarkkam Viduvikkavumaattaadhu.
9 ivaiyellaavatraiyum Naan Paarththu, Sooriyanukkuk Keezhe Seyyappadum Ellaak Kiriyaigalaiyum Sindhiththen, Oru Manushan Thanakke Kedundaaga Veroru Manushanai Aalugira Kaalamumundu.
10 parisuththa Sthalaththukkup Pokkuvaravu Seydha Dhunmaarkkar Adakkampannappattadhaik Kanden. Avargal Appadi Seydhu Vandha Pattanaththileye Marakkappattupponaargal; Idhuvum Maayaiye.
11 dhurkkiriyaikkuth Thakka Thandanai Seekkiramaai Nadavaadhapadiyaal, Manupuththirarin Irudhayam Pollaappai Seyya Avargalukkulle Thunigarankondirukkiradhu.
12 paavi Noorudharam Pollaappai Seydhu Neediththu Vaazhndhaalum Enna? Dhevanukku Anji, Avarukku Munbaaga Bayandhiruppavargale Nandraayiruppaargal Endru Arindhirukkiren.
13 dhunmaarkkano Nandraayiruppadhillai; Avan Dhevanukku Munbaaga Bayappadaadhirukkirapadiyaal, Nizhalaippolirukkira Avanudaiya Vaazhnaal Neediththiruppadhumillai.

14 boomiyinmel Nadakkira Veroru Maayaiyaana Kaariyamumundu; Adhaavadhu, Dhunmaarkkarin Kiriyaikku Varuvadhupola, Needhimaangalukkum Varum; Needhimaangalin Kiriyaikku Varuvadhupola, Dhunmaarkkarukkum Varum; Idhuvum Maayai Endren.

15 aagaiyaal Naan Kalippaip Pugazhndhen; Pusippadhum Kudippadhum Magizhvadhumeyallaamal Sooriyanukkukkeezhe Manushanukku Veroru Nanmaiyum Illai; Sooriyanukkukkeezhe Dhevan Avanukkuth Thandha Jeevakaalaththil Avan Prayaasaththinaal Avanukku Nilaikkum Palan Idhuve.
16 naan Gnaanaththai Ariyavum, Manushan Iravum Pagalum Kannurakkamillaamal Boomiyile Seyyum Velaigalaip Paarkkavum En Manadhai Seluththinapodhu,

17 dhevan Seyyum Sagala Kiriyaigalaiyum Naan Gavaniththuppaarththu, Sooriyanukkuk Keezhe Seyyappadum Kiriyaiyai Manushan Kandupidikkak Koodaadhendru Kanden. Adhai Ariyumpadi Manushan Prayaasappattaalum Ariyamaattaan; Adhai Ariyalaam Endru Gnaani Enninaalum Avanum Adhai Arindhukollamaattaan.
